column5: Hey guys/gals if anybody has found a black and blue shimano tackle bag at depot in parry sound please let me know. Offering a substantial reward if everything gets back to me, or at least the auger batteries, you can keep the tackle, thanks for any help.
Call the bait shop, maybe someone turned it in.
Ill give them a call thanks
Good luck Ron. Hope theres an honest person that returns it.  Im always watching my back when walking in and always make sure nothing is left behind.

my hauger  fell off my sled when I was youg and stupid and there was a lot of traffic that Saturday afternoon going to the same spot on ninth line Oro never saw it again! But I  dropped  a bait box out of my vest in Meaford between shore rocks and six months later a I get a call all is found but the palstic box.  A first time fishing buddy (client) we took with us went back with marine magnets and picked everything up.

Thanks Brian and yea I made sure to check behind the sled, buddies were pulling it and i helped get it up the hill, must have fallen out then. Buddy said he put it in the car and never found it when we got back, went back later but it was gone, asked around nobody said they saw anything.
The hill ? Same place I met you that weekend ? I must go and try again. Let me know when your heading up again.  PM sent

We spent a week at a cabin on Angus Lake on hwy 11 south of Temagami about 15 years ago and found a fully loaded tackle box on the side of the hwy one day. No type of identification in it so we dropped it off at a local bait shop but I don't know if anyone ever claimed it.
No this was depot Brian, that place was on joseph i believe.
